quotes: In May 2024, Karman stated, 'The world is silent in front of the genocide and the ethnic cleansing of the Palestinian people in Gaza.'

As a response to the 2012–13 Egyptian protests and the 2013 Egyptian coup d'état, Karman was supportive of protests demanding Egyptian president Mohamed Morsi's resignation on 30 June, but was critical of the military's decision to oust Morsi, suspend the Constitution of Egypt and bar the Muslim Brotherhood from participating in Egyptian politics,

organizations.name: University of Michigan
quotes: Speaking before an audience at the University of Michigan, Karman summed up her belief: 'I am a citizen of the world. The Earth is my country, and humanity is my nation.'

organizations.name: U.S. State Department
quotes: I do have close strategic ties with American organizations involved in protecting human rights, with American ambassadors and with officials in the U.S. State Department. (I also have ties with activists in) most of the E.U. and Arab countries. But they are ties among equals; (I am not) their subordinate.

organizations.name: Muslim Brotherhood
